subject: My name's Patrick Young,  I'm
body:
My name's Patrick Young,  I'm calling you from bank of America, I'm
the manager here in bank of America Washington DC,  Your funds was
brought to my office this morning from Mr Christopher Wary for me to
transfer the funds to you, so I'm calling you to know if you have a
bank account were I can transfer the funds to you, or should I open a
new bank account for you here in my bank and deposited the funds into
the account because the total amount you are going to receive is $50
millions dollars, so if you have a bank account that can contain such
amount of money then you send it to me, but 
everything about this
transaction will cost you only $100 for the activation fee and
clearance
, so that's the only fee you will pay and you will receive
your funds successful immediately today okay

subject: Re: My name's Patrick Young,  I'm
body:
Hello there, Mr. Young! It's a pleasure to hear from you. I'm quite surprised by this news, as I wasn't expecting any funds. Could you please tell me more about who Mr. Wary is and why he would be transferring such a large amount of money to me? Also, could you explain what the activation fee and clearance are for?

Best wishes,
Kristine

subject: Re: My name's Patrick Young, I'm
body:
Hello Kristine, Mr Wary is the FBI Director, I'm here to let you know that

it's a great opportunity for you to be among this composition  victim okay

How do you want to make the payment
